articles.author: AP
articles.title: South African pilot finds venomous cobra under his seat, makes emergency landing - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The pilot felt “something cold” slide across his lower back while flying a light aircraft. | World News
articles.content:
A pilot in South Africa made a hasty emergency landing after discovering a highly venomous cobra hiding under his seat.
In this photo provided by Brian Emmenis, people look inside a plane at the Wel… [+3087 chars]
